Cédric Beust ♔ wrote:
> It seems to me that the use of a property file makes it a runtime
> configurable option:  just launch your test by pointing them to a different
> property file.

Right, it is runtime, different bundle, shell argument, etc. are all
isomorphic.


> TestNG's answer to this is test groups:  put your test methods in various
> groups, e.g. "fake" or "jdbc" and then run just that group.

OK, probably a dumb question, what is a test group? Got a URL so I
can get smarter? sample code, etc.



Thanks
